hard: Counter heroes who Nebula buffs – the best way how to deal with Nebula is countering heroes who she is supporting.
High aoe burst damage – Nebula is a squishy hero you can try to take her out with high burst damage with heroes like Karkh, blender Keira, etc
soft: Displacement – Nebula hasn’t real counters since she is a support but you can try to mess with the enemy’s team placement to make Nebula give buffs to the wrong allies. For example, Lars dragging skill or Faceless knockback.
Defense artifacts – depending on what Nebula is supporting you can go for armor or magic defense artifact to deny some of the incoming damage.
